CanvasRenderingContext2DCreatePattern.summary:
The CanvasRenderingContext2D.createPattern() method of the Canvas 2D API creates a pattern using the specified image and repetition.
This method returns a .

remarks.para:
This method doesn't draw anything to the canvas directly.
The pattern it creates must be assigned to the or properties, after which it is applied to any subsequent drawing.

CanvasRenderingContext2DCreatePattern.returns: If the image is not fully loaded ( is false), then null is returned.
